title: One Pace
tagline: The Astonishing Thousand Sunny and Usopp's Tearful Apology!
summary: The Straw Hats set sail, but Usopp is conspicuously missing. Zoro soberly reminds Luffy that Usopp's return should not be granted so casually. More immediately, the pirates need to avoid Garp’s barrage of cannon balls!
